## Multi-comparison cost-effectiveness acceptability curve

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=4.6, fig.height=4.6, fig.align=align}
if (n.ints == 2) {
  graph = "base"
  pos = c(1,1)
} else {
  graph = "ggplot2"
  pos = TRUE}

ceac.plot(m.mce, graph = graph, pos = pos)
```
